items.sentence: Just being in Tom's company is enough to ruin Mary's reputation.
Tom was suspended from school because he swore at his classmate.
I suspected Tom wasn't really planning to go to Boston with you.
I suspected that Tom and Mary were planning to do that together.
The spokesman explained the contents of the treaty to the press.
It was very hard to anticipate how Tom would react to this news.
Tom put on so much weight that he had to have his pants let out.
Tom was about to make the most important phone call of his life.
Tom finds it hard to sit through a movie without going to sleep.
Tom's teacher told him to pay more attention to his punctuation.
